comments.comment: What sort of nonsense is this?  Doesn't the President of the country know the National Anthem and how he should behave when it is being played?  Those other idiots in front of the stage are not standing to attention but waving their hands.  Is this the respect they have for their motherland?  I'm sure all these are from the Banana Republic.  Shame on all of you.....

comments.comment: me wage podi podi dewal allagena dagalana ayata loku loku aparada penenne nathi wevi

The National Anthem is an important symbol for our nation of Sri Lanka. But we have to be careful that does not be used it in a wrong way behavior, In last days, Bala Mahima published a video on the internet where a very sad picture of our President gave the salute when people are singing the National Anthem with the question. It's been created as our President has been ready to say goodbye to the nation. We have heard for so many words that the President is going exciting and has been fearful that people will stop listening. I would like to say, Our President, " IF YOU CAN NOT BECOME KING THEN TAKE TO THE HEALING ART" -OR YOU ARE GOING TO SERVE AS GRAMA SEWA NILADARY." RAJA KAM BERY NAM WEDA KAM KARANU. EKATH BERY NAM GRAMA NILADARY  WEDAY KARANU.
